definition[0]: a strong feeling in society that being in a particular situation or having a particular illness is something to be ashamed of
example[0]: There is a social stigma attached to single parenthood.
example[1]: In the US, smoking carries a stigma.
example[2]: The stigma of alcoholism makes it difficult to treat.
note[0]: the stigma of alcoholism/mental illness etc
definition[1]: the top of the centre part of a flower that receives the pollen which allows it to form new seeds
